content.rendered:
Big thanks FINTECH+ and John Hucker, CFA, MBA for the great interview with our CEO, Paul Resch, CVA
We always enjoy collaborating with like-minded professionals. John is the President of Swiss Finance + Technology Association (Swiss FinTech) and Founder of FinTech+. It was a pleasure talking him through what we are up to.

Find out more about Valutico by watching the video.

Enjoy!
